assembled_prompt_text: A felted wool rhinoceros with hyper-realistic eyes and expressive posture, arms wide with palms forward in a cheerful welcome gesture, wearing a broad-brimmed straw sunhat with subtle felted texture, standing in a miniature cobblestone piazza stage with matte off-white wall meeting floor at 90°, photographed with 35mm lens at eye-level 1m height angled 5° downward, warm late-afternoon sunlight 4800K from front-left at 45° with soft fill and gentle rim light, full-body framing, stop-motion miniature aesthetic, handcrafted felted wool texture with visible fibers, nostalgic golden-hour lighting, warm and optimistic atmosphere.
